key.name: shortcut
key.summary: The keyboard shortcut used to pop-up the MATE HUD
key.description: The format looks like "<Control>a" or "<Shift><Alt>F1". The parser is fairly liberal and allows lower or upper case, and also abbreviations such as "<Ctl>" and "<Ctrl>". Note that using a single modifier key, such as "Alt_L", as your shortcut may cause erratic behaviour with other window shortcuts that use the same key.
